definition: Electric field instrument (EFI) Langmuir probe (LP) measurements at 1Hz
description: The EFIXLPI_1B Product contains the EFIX_LP_1B plasma data, which are data from the Langimur Probe (LP) of the Electrical Field Instrument (EFI), interpolated at full UTC seconds, the same as the low resolution magnetic data MAG_LR.
variables_table:
Variable,Units,Description,Dim,Type
Timestamp,-,"Time stamp",1,CDF_EPOCH
SyncStatus,-,"Synchronization status",1,CDF_UINT2
Latitude,deg,"Geocentric latitude",1,CDF_DOUBLE
Longitude,deg,"Geocentric longitude",1,CDF_DOUBLE
Radius,m,"Distance from the Earth's center",1,CDF_DOUBLE
U_orbit,m/s,"Spacecraft velocity in the ITRF",2,CDF_DOUBLE
N_ion,cm-3,"Plasma density estimated from the ion current",1,CDF_DOUBLE
dN_ion,cm-3,"Suggested calibration correction of N_ion",1,CDF_DOUBLE
N_ion_error,cm-3,"Statistical error of the ion density estimate",1,CDF_DOUBLE
N_elec,cm-3,"Plasma density estimated from the electron current",1,CDF_DOUBLE
N_elec_error,cm-3,"Statistical error of the electron density estimate",1,CDF_DOUBLE
T_elec,K,"Plasma electron temperature",1,CDF_DOUBLE
T_elec_error,K,"Error estimate of plasma electron temperature (Te)",1,CDF_DOUBLE
dT_elec,cm-3,"Suggested calibration correction od T_elec",1,CDF_DOUBLE
Vs,V,"Spacecraft potential",1,CDF_DOUBLE
Vs_error,V,"Error estimate of spacecraft potential (Vs)",1,CDF_DOUBLE
Flags_LP,-,"Flags indicating the source/method of LP measurements (Ni, Te, Vs)",1,CDF_UINT1
Flags_N_ion,-,"Flags characterizing the ion density estimate",1,CDF_UINT1
Flags_N_elec,-,"Flags characterizing the electron density estimate",1,CDF_UINT1
Flags_T_elec,-,"Flags characterizing the electron temperature measurement",1,CDF_UINT1
Flags_Vs,-,"Flags characterizing the spacecraft potential measurement",1,CDF_UINT1
Gamma1,deg,"Sun inclination angle related to right-side solar-panel normal angle",1,CDF_DOUBLE
Gamma2,deg,"Sun inclination angle related to left-side solar-panel normal angle",1,CDF_DOUBLE
Flagbits1,-,"Detailed indication of the source and anomalies",1,CDF_INT4
Flagbits2,-,"Detailed indication of the source and anomalies",1,CDF_INT4

details:
Warning: Format changes to this product were released in baseline version 07 (Ne to N_ion etc)

Flag Value Description
Flags_LP 1 T_elec High gain probe data
5 T_elec mixed gain probe data
9 Sweep was done at this time stamp, estimate from previous second is duplicated
Flags_N_ion,
Flags_N_elec,
Flags_T_elec		 10 Nominal data,
valid calibration offset and random error for this sample is computed,
The estimate is from high gain probe.
19 Nominal data,
calibration offset not computed/not available in this region,
random error computed,
The estimate is from high gain probe.
20 Nominal data,
Calibration offset computed,
Random error not computed for this sample,
The estimate is from high gain probe.
21 Nominal data,
Calibration offset not computed/not available in this region,
Random error not computed,
The estimate is from high gain probe.
22 Nominal data,
Artificial spike detected (not implemented for N_elec),
Calibration offset computed,
Random error not computed for this sample,
The estimate is from high gain probe
23 Nominal data,
Artificial spike detected (not implemented for N_elec),
Calibration offset not computed/not available in this region;
Random error not computed.
The estimate is from high gain probe.
30 The estimate is from low gain probe for N_ion, N_elec;
The estimate is from mixed gain probe data for T_elec
40 The estimate is from low gain probe data for N_ion, N_elec, from mixed gain probe data for T_elec;
however, none of this data is usable
Flags_Vs 20 Nominal data, error for this sample is not computed
30 Error detected, the estimate is from high gain
